buy_dip_info: The minimum percentage above the monthly low that the current price must be for a purchase to be made
sell_target_info: The minimum percentage below the monthly high that the current price must be for a sale to be made
volume_per_trade_info: The amount of money used for a single transaction (buy/sell)
usd_balance_info: The amount of fictional balance available for trading during evaluation
evaluation_info: The percentage gain/loss of the model evaluation (base 100%)
usd_wallet_info: The amount of USD held in the virtual wallet
eth_wallet_info: The amount of ETH held in the virtual wallet
evaluation_price_info: The price used to convert ETH to USD (if you sold all the ETH at the end of the evaluation)
final_balance_info: The total balance after evaluation (with ETH converted to USD)
buys_info: The number of buy transactions executed
sells_info: The number of sell transactions executed
